Question
========

Given two independent stochastic variables x (with mean 3 and variance 5) and y (with mean 6 and variance 4). z = x - y. Mean and variance of z are then respectively

Answerlist
----------

* -3 and 9
* 3 and 41
* 3 and √41
* -3 and √41

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3 and 9: Correct
* 3 and 41: Incorrect
* 3 and √41: Incorrect
* -3 and √41: Incorrect
